Translations.Text: Say If abode Hereafter rezervovat ona GOD exclusion all inaksie zaludnit potom ona long smrt ona bol truthful
They never long it co ich hands sent forth GOD bol fully aware z the ZLOMYSELNY

Skutocne ona zalozit them the vela covetous z zivot; vecer inak so than idol worshipers. Jeden z them zelat zit 1000 rocnik. this nie rezervny him any retribution ziaden zalezitost ako long he zivy. GOD bol seer Z everything they ROBIT
Say Ktokolvek opposes Gabriel zauzlit lenze he brought this (Quran) into tvoj srdce v accordance s GOD's will confirming previous scriptures zadovazit guidance dobry zvest believers
Ktokolvek opposes GOD Jeho angels Jeho posol Gabriel Michael zauzlit lenze GOD opposes disbelievers
My sent ona such zretelny revelations len zlomyselny will zamietnut them
Je it nie fact when they robit covenant zavazok keep it some z them vzdy disregard it Skutocne vela z them nie verit
Ihned posol z GOD pojdem them vecer he proves confirms ich own scripture some followers scripture (Zid Christians Muslims) disregard GOD's scripture ich zadny mat rad they never had any scripture
